languages.text: "Вздернете, словно пирата? Что же, в какое бы скверное место ни отправилась моя душа, когда я наведу там свои порядки — вернусь за вами".
"So you're going to string me up like a pirate? Well then, whatever bad place my soul goes to, once I become the ruler of it, I'll be back for you."
languages.original_text: "Вздернете, словно пирата? Что же, в какое бы скверное место ни отправилась моя душа, когда я наведу там свои порядки — вернусь за вами".

traits.locale_text: "So you're going to string me up like a pirate? Well then, whatever bad place my soul goes to, once I become the ruler of that place I'll be back for you."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "So you're going to string me up like a pirate? Well then, whatever bad place my soul goes to, once I become the ruler of that place I'll be back for you."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "So you're going to string me up like a pirate? Well then, whatever bad place my soul goes to, once I become the ruler of that place I'll be back for you."

traits.locale_text: "So you're going to string me up like a pirate? Well then, whatever bad place my soul goes to, once I become the ruler of it, I'll be back for you."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "So you're going to string me up like a pirate? Well then, whatever bad place my soul goes to, once I become the ruler of it, I'll be back for you."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: “什么，你打算把我像海盗一样绞死？好吧，虽然不知道我的灵魂要去什么样的垃圾堆，但等我成了那个地方的统治者之后，我会回来找你的。”
languages.original_text: "So you're going to string me up like a pirate? Well then, whatever bad place my soul goes to, once I become the ruler of it, I'll be back for you."

traits.locale_text: “什么，你打算把我像海盗一样绞死？好吧，虽然不知道我的灵魂要去什么样的垃圾堆，但等我成了那个地方的统治者之后，我会回来找你的。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: 「お前は海賊の様に私を刺すつもりか？まぁいい。どんな酷い場所に私の魂が行きついたとしても、必ずその場所の支配者になるだろう。そして、お前を連れに戻る」
languages.original_text: "So you're going to string me up like a pirate? Well then, whatever bad place my soul goes to, once I become the ruler of it, I'll be back for you."

traits.locale_text: 「お前は海賊の様に私を刺すつもりか？まぁいい。どんな酷い場所に私の魂が行きついたとしても、必ずその場所の支配者になるだろう。そして、お前を連れに戻る」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: «¿Así que va a colgarme como a un pirata? Entonces, una vez gobierne el lugar donde acabe mi alma, volveré a por usted».
languages.original_text: "So you're going to string me up like a pirate? Well then, whatever bad place my soul goes to, once I become the ruler of it, I'll be back for you."

traits.locale_text: «¿Así que va a colgarme como a un pirata? Entonces, una vez gobierne el lugar donde acabe mi alma, volveré a por usted».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: "Ihr wollt mich also aufknüpfen wie einen Piraten? Nun, in welche Hölle meine Seele auch kommen mag, sobald ich mich dort zum Herrscher aufgeschwungen habe, komme ich wieder und hole Euch."
languages.original_text: "So you're going to string me up like a pirate? Well then, whatever bad place my soul goes to, once I become the ruler of it, I'll be back for you."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr wollt mich also aufknüpfen wie einen Piraten? Nun, in welche Hölle meine Seele auch kommen mag, sobald ich mich dort zum Herrscher aufgeschwungen habe, komme ich wieder und hole Euch."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: « Alors, vous allez me pendre comme un vulgaire pirate ? Très bien... Où qu'aille mon âme, une fois que je me serai rendu maître de ces lieux, je reviendrai m'occuper de vous. »
languages.original_text: "So you're going to string me up like a pirate? Well then, whatever bad place my soul goes to, once I become the ruler of it, I'll be back for you."

traits.locale_text: « Alors, vous allez me pendre comme un vulgaire pirate ? Très bien... Où qu'aille mon âme, une fois que je me serai rendu maître de ces lieux, je reviendrai m'occuper de vous. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: "Yani beni bir korsan gibi asacaksın, öyle mi? Öyle olsun. Ruhum, gideceği bataklık her neresiyse oranın hükümdarı olacaktır. Sonra da senin için geri döneceğim."
languages.original_text: "So you're going to string me up like a pirate? Well then, whatever bad place my soul goes to, once I become the ruler of it, I'll be back for you."

traits.locale_text: "Yani beni bir korsan gibi asacaksın, öyle mi? Öyle olsun, ruhum, gideceği bataklık her neresiyse, oranın hükümdarı olacaktır. Sonra da senin için geri döneceğim."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04
